message.body: What time were you thinking for bowling?
Im thinking I might take advantage of some ipa's here. A rare occasion when Ingrid is away. Thanks though. Should hit up the 10 pin sometime soon.
I don't know. Whatever time you were available.
I guess my thought process was to drink some beers or go bowling. Both activities can be done in Ingrid's activities. If you want to go bowling later let
Why don't you come. Drink a few beers and then we go bowling around 9
But if you don't want to that's cool too
I'll come over. Don't mean o intrude. Be there about 8ish. Don't worry about food for me.
